model

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Board

  • public final class Board
extends java.util.Observable
    A representation of a Tetris game board.
    Version:
    Autumn 2015
    Author:
    Alan Fowler

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Board(int theWidth, int theHeight)
      Constructs a Board using the specified dimensions and random pieces.
      Board(int theWidth, int theHeight, java.util.Deque<Piece> thePieces)
      Constructs a Board using the specified dimensions and the specified sequence of pieces.

      Returns the current Piece being moved.

      Returns the current frozen blocks on the board.

      Returns the next piece to be used.
      int getWidth()

      Drops the current Piece all the way down.

      Returns whether the game is over or not.

      Attempts to move the current piece down.

      Attempts to move the current piece to the left.

      Attempts to move the current piece to the right.

      Creates a new game on a Board of the specified width and height and loads the given set of pieces.
      void rotate()
      Attempts to rotate the current piece clockwise.
      void step()
      Updates the game by one step.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string that represents the current state of the board.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Board

        public Board(int theWidth,
             int theHeight,
             java.util.Deque<Piece> thePieces)
        Constructs a Board using the specified dimensions and the specified sequence of pieces.
        Parameters:
        theWidth - the grid width to assign to this Tetris board
        theHeight - the grid height to assign to this Tetris board
        thePieces - the sequence of pieces to use; an empty list or null indicates a random game

      • Board

        public Board(int theWidth,
             int theHeight)
        Constructs a Board using the specified dimensions and random pieces.
        Parameters:
        theWidth - the grid width to assign to this Tetris board; 10 is the standard
        theHeight - the grid height to assign to this Tetris board; 20 is the standard

    • Method Detail

      • newGame

        public void newGame(int theWidth,
                    int theHeight,
                    java.util.Deque<Piece> thePieces)
        Creates a new game on a Board of the specified width and height and loads the given set of pieces.
        Parameters:
        theWidth - The grid width of the board; 10 is the standard value
        theHeight - The grid height of the board; 20 is the standard value
        thePieces - The pieces to use; null indicates that random pieces should be used
